Symbol.Script_1D:
NOT_SET = -1 NOT_SHOW = 0 SHOW_3D = 1 SHOW_TOP = 2 SHOW_SIDE = 3 show_type = NOT_SET
StandingB = 1 TemporaryB = 2 HstrengthB = 3 ChimanchorB = 4 ManchorB = 5 FoundB = 6
show_crew = 0 : success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "show_crew", show_crew) if show_crew=0 then show_type = NOT_SHOW else bolt_show_all = 0 success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "bolt_show_all", bolt_show_all) if bolt_show_all=1 then show_type = SHOW_3D endif
if show_type = NOT_SET then inx = 0 inxb=0 dim bolt_ang1[15][2] dim bolt_ang2[15][2] bolt_hide_inv = 0 success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "bolt_ang1", bolt_ang1) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "bolt_ang2", bolt_ang2) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "bolt_hide_inv", bolt_hide_inv) for i=1 to vardim1(bolt_ang1) usl1 = 0 usl2 = 0 flt = 0 if bolt_ang1[i][1]<>bolt_ang1[i][2] then max_ang1 = max(bolt_ang1[i][1],bolt_ang1[i][2]) min_ang1 = min(bolt_ang1[i][1],bolt_ang1[i][2]) usl1 = ((ang1<max_ang1)*(ang1>min_ang1)) else max_ang1=bolt_ang1[i][1] min_ang1=-1 usl1 = (ang1=max_ang1) if usl1 then flt = flt + 1 endif if bolt_ang2[i][1]<>bolt_ang2[i][2] then max_ang2 = max(bolt_ang2[i][1],bolt_ang2[i][2]) min_ang2 = min(bolt_ang2[i][1],bolt_ang2[i][2]) usl2 = ((ang2<max_ang2)*(ang2>min_ang2)) else max_ang2=bolt_ang2[i][1] min_ang2=-1 usl2 = (ang2=max_ang2) if usl2 then flt = flt + 1 endif if usl1*usl2 then inx = i if flt=1 then inxb=i if flt=2 then i = vardim1(bolt_ang1) endif next i if inx>0 and inxb>0 then inx=inxb if inx = 0 then if bolt_hide_inv=0 then show_type = SHOW_3D else show_type = NOT_SHOW endif else dim bolt_top[15] dim bolt_side[15] dim bolt_hide[15] success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "bolt_top", bolt_top) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "bolt_side", bolt_side) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "bolt_hide", bolt_hide) if bolt_hide[inx]=1 and bolt_hide_inv=0 then show_type = NOT_SHOW if bolt_hide[inx]=0 and bolt_hide_inv=1 then show_type = NOT_SHOW if bolt_side[inx]=1 then show_type = SHOW_SIDE if bolt_top[inx]=1 then show_type = SHOW_TOP if show_type = NOT_SET then show_type = SHOW_3D endif endif
show_el=-1 call "Показ_по_группам" PARAMETERS ALL el_views=el_views RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_el if show_el=0 then show_type=NOT_SHOW
show_wash_list = NOT_SET show_hole = NOT_SET
success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "show_list", show_wash_list) if show_wash_list=1 then show_wash_list=SHOW_3D if show_type<>SHOW_3D and show_wash_list=SHOW_3D then show_wash_list=NOT_SHOW success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "show_hole", show_hole)
parameters show_type=show_type, show_wash_list = show_wash_list, show_hole = show_hole end show_type, show_wash_list, show_hole
Symbol.Script_VL: if vardim1(el_views)<=1 then dim el_tmp[] for i=1 to 20 el_tmp[i] = " " next i parameters el_views = el_tmp endif
